Package org.drip.state.sequence

Class PathRd

java.lang.Object
org.drip.state.sequence.PathRd
Direct Known Subclasses:
PathGovvie
public class PathRd
extends java.lang.Object
PathRd exposes the Functionality to generate a Sequence of the Path Vertex Latent State Rd Realizations across Multiple Paths.

  • Module = Product Core Module
  • Library = Fixed Income Analytics
  • Project = Latent State Inference and Creation Utilities
  • Package = Monte Carlo Path State Realizations


Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
